import React, { Component } from 'react' import './../css/cart.css' import { mainapi } from '../api/API' import { X } from '@phosphor-icons/react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Userconsumer } from './CartContext' export class Cart extends Component { render() { return ( { (nn)=>{ return(

My Cart

{ nn[1].itno = 0?

:

}

)} } ) } } export default Cart
